title: Can we make it so towers don't die when you sneeze on them?
body: I don't feel I need to explain this anymore. Towers are laughably easy to kill.

This is true.

Ziggs' poke becomes very inaccurate at range, compared to other mages who maintain reliable accuracy at a distance.

Other mages can zone just by being a monstrously oppressive burst damage dealers (if you get too close to a Syndra or a Vel'Koz it's going to hurt... a lot) whereas Ziggs has to rely on an inaccurate spammable mini-burst spell to deal damage and must rely on zoning via mines and satchel charges, both of which have significant cooldowns.

Ziggs probably has the biggest AoW nuke in the game, but things like Vel'Koz ult and MF ult are more reliable and potentially deal more damage.

Ziggs can reliably burst a damaged tower, but an ADC will reliably melt a tower from 100-0 faster, as Ziggs is limited by cooldowns on his passive when getting a tower below execution range.

I can't agree with this more.

I remember back in season 3 when we had turrets that could actually do damage and not be tanked near infinitely by various champions.  Then Riot started playing with them and touching up the turrets so they had, if you remember, the shield on the 2nd turret in each lane and the laser beam on the base turret.  Now, a full health turret can be taken down in less than 30 seconds by one champion after 10 minutes has gone by.  Don't believe me? Use Xin Zhao with Sheen and Stinger or anybody with attack speed over 1.5.  

I had a proposal to prevent turrets from being so easily destroyed but Riot would never do it since it involves balancing the game.  So instead, how about giving turrets more health, MR, armor, and MAYBE some health regeneration on the 2nd turret at least? So they have a chance of not being destroyed in five seconds?  Right now there is no consequence - tank champion dives the turret and takes aggro while 2-3 fighters destroy it in seconds and the tank still has 80% health after 5-6 shots.
For how long has this issue been the top of our concern? Riot won't do anything anytime soon.
By increasing tower defence, matches will take longer. I feel like matches are at a good length already.
